forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional showers this afternoon. High 12C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early, then off and on rain showers for the afternoon. High 54F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 7C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain early...then remaining cloudy with a few showers. Low 44F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial sunshine expected late. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High around 55F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to occasional showers later during the night. Low 6C. Winds SE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early followed by increasing clouds with showers developing later at night. Low 43F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 11C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 52F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Winds increasing late. Low 7C. W winds at 10 to 15 km/h, increasing to 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Winds increasing late. Low 44F. W winds at 5 to 10 mph, increasing to 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High around 10C. Winds WSW at 40 to 55 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy and windy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds WSW at 25 to 35 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 6C. Winds W at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 11C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. High 52F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 7C. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 44F. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain. High 11C. Winds WSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 51F. Winds WSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 6C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 43F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 48F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. Low around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 9C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: A few showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 49F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear skies. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 34F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 9C. Winds E at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies in the morning will give way to cloudy skies during the afternoon. High 48F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 3C. Winds ENE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 38F. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 50%.
